name: Wordpress tinyMCE-pre-code-wrapper
tagline: Adds a plugin to tinyMCE to quickly wrap or insert <pre><code> tags - Plays good with highlight.js
body:
### Welcome to Wordpress tinyMCE-pre-code-wrapper webpage #### What is it? This is a plugin that adds a button to the tinyMCE editor in WordPress. The button either adds a
or wraps the selected text in it. This works well for developer blogs that use some kind of code markup highlighter. For example the [WP Code highlight.js plugin](https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-code-highlightjs/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
